byline.contributor: Ian Austen contributed reporting from Ottawa, and Jack Healy from Denver.
byline.original: By PETER BAKER and CORAL DAVENPORT

lead_paragraph: The new president continued dismantling his predecessor’s policies by clearing the way for a project at the heart of the battle over climate change.
snippet: The new president continued dismantling his predecessor’s policies by clearing the way for a project at the heart of the battle over climate change....

headline.main: Trump Revives Keystone Pipeline Rejected by Obama
headline.print_headline: President Revives Two Oil Pipelines Thwarted Under Obama
